jobsdb.title: Senior Developer
jobsdb.description: We are a Digital Asset/Cryptocurrency Exchange based in Singapore and we are looking for a Senior Developer to join our team and help lead and grow our company further. We are looking for a full-stack (focusing more on front-end development) engineer who can also manage a team and advise senior management on company direction moving forward.   Some of the responsibilities include (but are not limited to):  Design and develop web & mobile applications for the exchange platform. Develop or enhance the existing web and mobile architecture and maintain and improve existing codebase. Work closely with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation. Develop new user-facing features, build reusable code and libraries for future use and optimize application for maximum speed and scalability. Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end Find new and better solutions and see how the company can evolve in the long run. Build high-quality mockups and design different prototypes. Research, design, develop, and test blockchain technologies. Brainstorm and help evaluate applications for new tools and technologies as they continually evolve. Maintain and extend current client- and server-side applications responsible for integration and business logic.  Requirements:  Skills: React.JS, React Native/Flutter, Java Script, CSS 3, HTML5, C++, Python ( Depending on projects). Thorough understanding of React.JS and its core principle (e.g. Redux). Familiar with API integration & WebSocket. Familiar with version control tools such as Git. Experience working with large codebases and with open-source projects. Strong knowledge of common algorithms and data structures. Familiarity with basic cryptography and P2P networks. Strong knowledge of bitcoin-like blockchains.   The Profile We are looking for:  Strong software development background. Ability to work as a team and has good communication skills in English. Able to develop an app from scratch. Good interpersonal and communication skills. Blockchain developer with startup experience preferred Possess at least a degree in Computer Science or any related field (optional) At least 3 years of working experience is required for this position.   Working Schedule:  Monday to Friday: 9.30 a.m – 6.30 p.m Working Location at Cecil Street.  Apply Today: This position comes with an attractive salary package, competitive benefits and a golden experience to learn and grow. You will be joining a fast-growing team in the cutting-edge industry of Financial Technology. By submitting your application and resume to us, you will be deemed to have agreed and consented to us collecting, using, retaining and disclosing your personal information for consideration. All resumes will be treated with the strictest confidentiality. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

jobsdb.title: Software Engineer
jobsdb.description: Company Description We are an early stage EdTech firm. Our goal is to build a mobile app to provide better learning experiences for adults in language learning. We're looking for people who are enthusiastic about our product but also fast and independent learners. As a full-stack engineer at an early-stage company, you'll be an essential part of the product team and will be shipping code daily to a rapidly growing user base. Why this role? Get your hands dirty: As one of our initial founding members, you'll play a role in shaping the product and learn every aspect of app development. Fast-paced: You'll be involved with product development in every angle, from front-end to back-end, to infrastructure. Lead and grow a team: You’ll have the opportunity to direct development of the application! Build a product that counts: We believe we can change the language learning space. We hope you are interested too! Join at an exciting time: We're at the start of our journey and have just completed a prototype, preparing for launch. You'll be an essential part of that launch. We're also starting to search for seed funding so we will be expanding quickly. Role: Write code that is reusable, scalable and testable while ensuring that products are delivered on time and with high quality Lead development for the front end interface, own and implement the product from start to end Work closely with the founding team to develop product Drive and participate in technical discussions with other engineering team members Continuously help the team grow and improve either by mentoring new or junior members or by introducing and adopting process improvements Be responsible and responsive during on-call duty, with strong ability to debug and troubleshoot production issues, monitor the performance of the live apps and continuously improve them on both code and experience level Requirements: 4+ years of experience in mobile development (Dart, React Native, Android, iOS, or other mobile stack) Bachelors’ degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or equivalent from a reputable university Strong CS fundamentals (with competencies in algorithms and data structures) Experience in building apps in Flutter and ReactNative preferred Experience in using Firebase preferred Demonstrable ability of having led development teams Strong analytical capabilities and ability to simplify code Excellent understanding of software engineering concepts, design patterns, and algorithms Experience in writing maintainable and testable code, including API design, unit testing and UI testing techniques Comfortable working up and down the technology stack Curiosity to explore creative solutions and try new things

jobsdb.description: OUR CLIENT PROFILE OUR CLIENT spearheads the bank’s innovation across the Group, which is one of the largest European bank. Extensive experience in RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to backend services.  Extensive experience in cloud message APIs (FCM and APN) and push notifications. Qualifications:   3 years+ work experience in mobile application, website related developments (showing project references from the past will be very helpful). jobsdb.description: Overview of RI Established in August 1998, the Institute of High Performance Computing (IHPC) is a Research Institute under the Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR). Committed to advancing science and technology, IHPC seeks to promote and spearhead scientific advances and technological innovations through computational modelling, simulation and AI, and to develop impactful applications to further economic growth and improve lives.Our research foci are in computing science and AI; large scale complex systems modelling; social and cognitive computing; and computational engineering mechanics, fluidic dynamics, electronics and photonics, materials science and chemistry.
